decision_conditions: The conversion of the roof from hip to gable end is situated on the roof plane of the principal elevation of the dwelling house as defined in the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended). The proposed development therefore does not constitute permitted development by virtue of the provisions of Article 3, Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B, Paragraph B.1(c) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended),

The proposed development does not constitute permitted development by virtue of the provisions of Article 3, Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B, Paragraph B.1(d)(ii) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended), as the proposed loft conversion would exceed 50m³ by 5.7m³.
description: Conversion of roof space to habitable use to include a rear dormer, 3 front roof lights and conversion of roof from hip to gable ends with new gable end window, following the removal of existing side dormer and roof lights (Application for a Certificate of Lawful Development for a Proposed Development)
